fields.request: Verify Constellation gateway devices are created
fields.request_details: Run the network-setup.sh --constellation workflow on a Linux watchtower and confirm dummy interfaces gwN are created for each node listed by the hub. Inspect `ip link` output to ensure every Constellation node shows a gw device with the matching alias, confirm stale gw devices are removed after peers are deleted or lose their overlay assignments, and then rerun the script without --constellation (or reboot) to verify the manifest restore recreates the expected gw devices automatically.
